title: 39 Ways to Save the Planet: #9 The Legal Fight

cards.definition: CarbonBrief works in partnership across borders, systems and sectors. Their work focuses on changing the system – informing, implementing and enforcing the law, advising decision-makers on policy and training legal and judicial professionals. Because a future in which people and planet thrive together isn’t just possible: it’s essential.
